import React from 'react' import { useLoaderData } from 'react-router-dom' import StarIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Star'; const Products = () => { const data = useLoaderData() const productData= data.data; console.log(productData) return (
{ productData.map((item)=>(
  • Compare
{item.category}

{item.title.substring(0,20)}

$ {item.price}

{item.description.substring(0,100)}...

)) }
) } export default Products
